DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness technology-based system ( Body Media FIT system ) enhance weight loss severely obese individual ( BMI : ≥ 40 kg/m2 ) . The investigator compare two 6-month intervention : 1 ) standard behavioral weight loss program ( SBT ) 2 ) standard behavioral weight loss program plus use Body Media FIT system ( SBT+FIT ) . The Body Media® FIT system novel weight loss tool consist armband measure energy expenditure , digital display watch provide `` real time '' physical activity energy expenditure feedback , access system website allow individual track food intake set exercise dietary goal . We examine difference physical activity , weight loss , program adherence group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Weight Loss Programs Individuals With Severe Obesity
DOC.criteria: Age 2155 Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥40kg/m2 ( 440 lb ) Recent weight loss ( ≥ 10 pound within past 6 month ) Currently pregnant , pregnant within last 6 month , plan become pregnant next 6 month . Presence condition would limit exercise participation ( assessed Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) ) . A history myocardial infarction heartrelated surgery . Currently enrol commercial weight loss program . A recent ( < 1 year ) diagnosis hospitalization psychological condition history psychosis ( e.g . Schizophrenia , Bipolar , Eating Disorder ) Diagnosed cancer within past year currently undergoing cancer treatment . Currently take weight loss medication . Currently daily access computer Internet . Individuals diabetes
